info.description:
# Instructions
## Create access token
To get an access token, please check if you have `Channel manager` `Group Admin` or `Company Admin` role (Check your current role by clicking your avatar on the top right-hand corner of the page. Your role is displayed under your name)

- Access your company domain settings using the following URL `https://{subdomain}.smarpshare.com/#/profile/settings`
- Navigate to `Access token` tab on the left-side menu.
> If you are `Channel manager` `Group Admin` or `Company Admin` role but cannot see Access token tab, please contact our support team to enable Access token feature.
- If you don't have an access token, please create one by pressing `Create new access token` button. Then give the name for the token so you remember where are you going to use it.

## Using access token
- If you already have access token, press button with copy icon (next to token string).
- To use access token, you must put it to HTTP request header `Authorization`. Here is cURL example
```
curl --request GET -H "Authorization: Bearer <your-access-token>" https://{subdomain}.smarpshare.com/api/allowed-access-token-api
```
- Any API having `access-token` as `Authorizations` option in this documentation is usable with access token.
info.title: Smarp API Reference

subdomain.description: this value is assigned by the service provider

parameters.name: list
parameters.description: type of the channels to filter by

parameters.name: groupedBy
parameters.description: indicate the structure that channels are responsed

parameters.name: groupId
parameters.description: retrieve list of channels of a group

parameters.name: isSubscribed
parameters.description: retrieve list of channels based on current session user's subscription

parameters.name: ignoreAccessibilityFilter
parameters.description: when true, ignore group's accessibility filter and retrieve all channels, only for admin and above. Default to false

201.description: Only when query 'groupedBy' is provided. Ignore the status code, it should be 200

get.summary: Returns all posts from the system visible to the user

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: type of the posts to filter by

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: page number for fetching the next patch of posts, starting from 0.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: number of posts fetched for the page

text.description: Raw text content of comment, the mentions are not substituted with textual values

displayText.description: Text content of comment without markdown elements

mentions.description: List of Mentions inside the comment

objectType.description: Target type, either post or resource

mentions.description: The list of user Ids mentioned in the comment
The list of user Ids mentioned in the comment

createdAt.description: Date when the channel was created

subscriberCount.description: Number of subscriber of the channel

subscriptionStatus.description: Subscription status of the user in the channel

firstName.description: first name of the Channel Manager

lastName.description: last name of the Channel Manager

isMandatory.description: Channel is mandatory for Company or teams where the user belongs to

groupId.description: Id of group that channel belongs

groupName.description: Name of group that channel belongs

isManager.description: User has management right for this channel or not.

isPrivate.description: Mark a private Channel. Users who aren't subscibed to a private channel won't be able to retrieve the channel.

groupId.description: Id of the group to which channel belongs

groupName.description: Name of the group to which channel belongs

companyId.description: Id of the company to which channel belongs

groupId.description: Id of the group to which channel belongs

firstName.description: first name of the Channel Manager

lastName.description: last name of the Channel Manager

isMember.description: Is this member belongs to the retrieved team

url.description: Url of the post. Note has empty string as url

videoUrl.description: Video Url of the post. Note has empty string as url

body.description: Body of the post. DEPRECATED, replaced by `description` and `fullBody`

description.description: short description text of the post's body

imageUrlList.description: List of a post's image url

createdByDisplay.description: Name of the creator. DEPRECATED due to GDPR

createdByType.description: Type of the post's creator, eg.: feed, admin, sharer, etc.

createdByAvatar.description: Avatar of the post's creator. DEPRECATED due to GDPR

updatedBy.description: Id of the last one who edited the post

updatedAt.description: Time when the post was last edited

companyId.description: Company where the post belongs to

publishedAt.description: Time when the post will be published

archivedAt.description: Time when the post will be archived

filteredChannelList.description: Channels where the post belongs to, filtered by the caller's subscription. Only includes channels where it has been published

fullChannelList.description: Channels where the post belongs to, unfiltered

socnetSet.description: List of socnet available, unordered. Empty for internal post

socnetList.description: List of socnet available, ordered. Empty for internal post

commentEnabled.description: whether comment is enabled for the post

commentCount.description: number of comments of the post

bookmarkId.description: Id of the bookmark made by the caller

bookmarkedAt.description: Time when the post was bookmarked

reviewedBy.description: For proposed post, Id of the reviewer

reviewedAt.description: For proposed post, time when it was reviewed

reviewMessage.description: For proposed post, message left by the reviewere, ONLY when the post is rejected.

reviewedByDisplay.description: For proposed post, Id of the reviewer. DEPRECATED due to GDPR

uniqueReadCount.description: number of unique reads of the post

shareCount.description: number of shares made from the post

clickCount.description: number of clicks generated by shares from the post

likeCount.description: Number of users who liked this post

isLiked.description: True if the user of the current session liked the post

isReadConfirmationRequired.description: True if the users should be requested to confirm reading the post

isReadConfirmationAnswered.description: True if the user has confirmed reading the post

readConfirmationCount.description: Number of subscribers who have confirmed reading the post

readerCount.description: Number of subscribers who have reader access to the post

commentSet.description: suggested comments when share to this network

scheduledShareList.description: List of post's scheduled shares made by current session user

sharePoint.description: points gained if share to this network

shareStatus.description: Status whether user has shared/scheduled share the posts to this network or not

viewCount.description: Clicks generated from shares made from this post to this network

_id.description: Id of channel the post belongs to

groupName.description: Group name where this channel belongs to

isManager.description: If current session user has management right to publish post for this channel

isPrivate.description: If this channel is private. A user who aren't subscribed to a private channel won't be able to see it

status.description: Publish status of the post in this channel. Approved and rejected are used only in frontend

publishedAt.description: Time when the post will be published

archivedAt.description: Time when the post will be archived

likeCount.description: Total number of people who like a post

addedBy.description: Id of author of the feedback

message.description: feedback message from admin to the post creator

videoUrl.description: Video Url of the post. Note has empty string as url

htmlBody.description: Rich text body of the post.

imageUrlList.description: List of a post's image url

publishedAt.description: Time when the post will be published

archivedAt.description: Time when the post will be archived

fullChannelList.description: Channels where the post belongs to, unfiltered

socnetSet.description: List of socnet available, unordered. Empty for internal post

commentEnabled.description: whether comment is enabled for the post

isReadConfirmationRequired.description: True if the users should be requested to confirm reading the post

comment.description: Comment to appear in social network post

createdAt.description: Date when the group was created

memberCount.description: Number of seat taken (= how many members are in the group)

seatLimit.description: Max amount of seats allocated for the group
Max amount of seats allocated for the group
Max amount of seats allocated for the group

emailCronEx.description: Cronex specifying when emails are sent

items.description: a limited version of Group object, representing accessible Groups
a limited version of Group object, representing inaccessible Groups

sharerInviteEnabled.description: Allow sharer to invite new sharer. Invitation must follow the emailDomainList

selfRegisterEnabled.description: Allow self-registeration for a new sharer.

emailDomainList.description: Email domain allowed for self-registered or sharer invitation

smsInvitationTemplate.description: Sms template for sending invitation. The placeholder for user and invitation link is included in the form of [Smarp User] and [invitation link]

invitationSignature.description: Signature of email template for sending invitation.

createdAt.description: Date when the channel was created

subscriberCount.description: Number of subscriber of the channel

subscriptionStatus.description: Subscription status of the user in the channel

firstName.description: first name of the Channel Manager

lastName.description: last name of the Channel Manager

isMandatory.description: Channel is mandatory for Company or teams where the user belongs to

isManager.description: Check if channel is managed by current session user

groupId.description: Id of group that channel belongs

groupName.description: Name of group that channel belongs

categoryMap.description: VERY OLD. SUPER DEPRECATED. List of user tag. It's not a string, just ignore it

RoleId.description: Id for a role in Permission Model. DEPRECATED

RoleName.description: Name of a role in Permission Model. DEPRECATED

RoleDescription.description: Description of a role in Permission Model. DEPRECATED

socnetList.description: socnet which user has been connected.
